snippet.title: American Truck Simulator Game Features
snippet.description:
Get to know American Truck Simulator, haul through the legendary roads! The game will take you on a journey throughout the vast landscapes full of breathtaking landmarks of North America. Drive iconic American trucks and become the King of the Road while building a large transportation company from scratch.

http://americantrucksimulator.com/

http://blog.scssoft.com/
https://twitter.com/SCSsoftware
https://www.facebook.com/americantrucksimulator.scs/
